amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Cloture on amendment SA 2521 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 41. Record Vote Number: 176.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 2521 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 2521 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S4884) In the nature of a substitute.
